name: Agnibarra
description: The Agnibarra is a Small monstrosity characterized by its fiery nature, emitting bright light in a 10-foot radius. Its body appears to be constantly engulfed in flames, and it has a menacing presence with sharp claws.
memorable: Agnibarra can ignite enemies and flammable objects around it, creating hazardous conditions in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to cause chaos and inflict fire damage on opponents.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other fire-themed creatures or as a guardian of fiery environments.
environment: Often found in volcanic regions or places with abundant fire sources.
strengths: Vulnerable to cold damage but immune to fire damage, making it resilient in fire-prevalent environments.
weaknesses: Weak against cold damage, which hinders its resilience.
attacks: Employs burning claws and spit fire attacks, inflicting both slashing and ongoing fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Body in Flames allows it to punish foes that engage in melee combat, igniting them for additional fire damage over time.
additional_information: Can communicate in Common and Ignan.
Possesses a strong Constitution score indicating durability.
Ignites any flammable objects within 5 feet.
Utilizes illumination to reveal hidden enemies.
Has a relatively high Dexterity score aiding in dodging attacks.
